game.name: Missy's Bugtastic Little Planet
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Missy the kitty will hang out with you anywhere on your desktop and catch bugs! She will earn money based on the rarity of what she catches, and you can use that money to buy cosmetics and upgrades, or just see how much money she can make!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Missy the kitty will hang out with you anywhere on your desktop and catch bugs! She will earn money based on the rarity of what she catches, and you can use that money to buy cosmetics and upgrades, or just see how much money she can make!
